name: ass-to-dub
description: Convert ASS subtitles to Dialogue List in DOCX format for dubbing
author: Seiya Loveless

scripts.build-dep: npm i -g removeNPMAbsolutePaths && npm i -g nexe
scripts.build-win-pre: removeNPMAbsolutePaths . && ( if exist build rmdir "./build/" /s /q ) && mkdir "./build/subtitles/"
scripts.build-win: npm run build-win-pre && nexe "./main.js" -r "./language/*" -t "windows-x64" -o "./build/ass-to-dub.exe" && ( if exist set_config.json copy set_config.json build )
